abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.game_description: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Aerilate

abilities.full_description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little. (Effect: Increases the power of Normal-type moves by 20%. It then changes those moves to Flying-type.)

abilities.name: Aftermath

abilities.full_description: Eliminates the effects of weather. (Effect: All weather effects are negated while the Pokémon is on the field.)

abilities.full_description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last. (Effect: Attack power increases by 30% if the Pokémon is the last Pokémon to attack this turn)

abilities.name: Arena Trap

abilities.technical_effect: The opponent cannot run nor switch. Flying-type Pokémon and Pokémon with the Levitate special ability are unaffected. If this Pokémon switches, the opponent is still trapped for that turn. The opponent may still switch by using Baton Pass.

If this Pokémon switches, the opponent is still trapped for that turn. The opponent may still switch by using Baton Pass.)

abilities.full_description: Halves the damage from physical moves onto this Pokémon.

abilities.technical_effect: All Flying-type moves have their Speed Priority increased by 1 if the Pokémon's Hit Points are at maximum
abilities.full_description: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the  Pokémon's HP is full. (Effect: All Flying-type moves have their Speed Priority increased by 1 if the Pokémon's Hit Points are at maximum)

abilities.name: Galvanize

abilities.full_description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little. (Effect: Increases the power of Normal-type moves by 20%. It then changes those moves to Electric-type.)

abilities.name: Gluttony

abilities.full_description: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual. (Effect: The Pokémon will use a berry when its Hit Points are below 50%.)

abilities.name: Good as Gold

abilities.full_description: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.game_description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
abilities.technical_effect: Lowers the opponent's Speed by one stage when it makes physical contact.
abilities.full_description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat. (Effect: Lowers the opponent's Speed by one stage when it makes physical contact.)

abilities.name: Gorilla Tactics
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move. (Effect: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat by one stage, but locks the Pokémon into using the first attack it uses after being sent out)

abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat in  Grassy Terrain. (Effect: Increases Defense by 50% when battling on Grass or if the move Grassy Terrain is in effect)

abilities.technical_effect: ActivatesGrassy Terrainfor 5 turns when the Pokémon enters a battle.
abilities.full_description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. (Effect: ActivatesGrassy Terrainfor 5 turns when the Pokémon enters a battle.)

abilities.name: Grim Neigh

abilities.full_description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Special Attack stat.

abilities.name: Guard Dog

abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

abilities.name: Gulp Missile

abilities.technical_effect: When using Surf or Dive, it will change into Gulping Form if it has over 50% max HP or Gorging Form if it has less than 50% max HP. If hit afterwards, form reverts and it shoots out its prey to attack, doing 1/4th of opponent's maximum HP in damage. If the Cramorant was in Gulping Form, the opponent's Defense is lowered 1 stage. If the Cramorant was in Gorging Form, the opponent is paralyzed.
abilities.full_description: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack. (Effect: When using Surf or Dive, it will change into Gulping Form if it has over 50% max HP or Gorging Form if it has less than 50% max HP. If hit afterwards, form reverts and it shoots out its prey to attack, doing 1/4th of opponent's maximum HP in damage. If the Cramorant was in Gulping Form, the opponent's Defense is lowered 1 stage. If the Cramorant was in Gorging Form, the opponent is paralyzed.)

abilities.name: Guts

abilities.full_description: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat. (Effect: Attack is increased by 50% when induced with a status (BURN, PARALYZE, SLEEP, POISON, FREEZE). Burn’s effect of lowering Attack is not applied.)

abilities.full_description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

abilities.full_description: May create another Berry after one is used. (Effect: The Pokémon has a 50% chance of restoring a consumed berry. During sunshine, this chance increases to 100%)

abilities.full_description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP. (Effect: Heals up to 25% of its partner Pokémon's Maximum Hit Points when it enters battle)

abilities.full_description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy. (Effect: Damage from physical attacks is increased by 50%, but average accuracy is only 80%.)

abilities.full_description: Heals status conditions if it's raining. (Effect: All status problems: Burn, Paralysis, Sleep, Frozen and Poison, are healed when raining.)

abilities.full_description: The Pokémon's proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat. (Effect: Opponent cannot lower this Pokémon’s Attack value. This Pokémon may still lower its own Attack value using a move of by itself.)

abilities.full_description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a Snowstorm. (Effect: HP is restored by 1/16th of maximum HP when its Snowing.)

abilities.name: Ice Face

abilities.full_description: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it Snows. (Effect: Has a protective barrier that protects against Physical Attacks once and will change form to Noice Face after breaking. Confusion also breaks the barrier. Setting Snow or being sent out during Snow will restore the Ice Face and change form to Ice Face)

abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

abilities.full_description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

abilities.name: Inner Focus

abilities.name: Intimidate

Pokémon with the Clear Body, Hyper Cutter, or White Smoke ability are unaffected. In a link battle, if both sides switch on the same turn, and first player sends out a Pokémon with Intimidate, the opponent’s Attack will be lowered before the opponent’s Pokémon switches.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat. (Effect: Upon entering battle or receiving the ability, the opponent’s Attack lowers one stage. In a Double Battle, both opponents’ Attack are lowered. Pokémon with the Clear Body, Hyper Cutter, or White Smoke ability are unaffected. In a link battle, if both sides switch on the same turn, and first player sends out a Pokémon with Intimidate, the opponent’s Attack will be lowered before the opponent’s Pokémon switches.)

abilities.full_description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land. (Effect: The accuracy of all moves known by this Pokémon and all Pokémon targeting this Pokémon raises to 100%)

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon cannot be under the Attract condition, Intimidated, or be taunted, while having this ability.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or falling for taunts. (Effect: The Pokémon cannot be under the Attract condition, Intimidated, or be taunted, while having this ability.)

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.game_description: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.
abilities.full_description: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

abilities.name: Orichalcum Pulse
abilities.game_description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
abilities.full_description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.game_description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.

abilities.full_description: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder. (Effect: Protects Pokémon from Weather Effects andPowder movessuch as Sleep Powder, Poison Powder etc.)

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.game_description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
abilities.technical_effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Grass-type moves is increased by 50%.
abilities.full_description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low. (Effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Grass-type moves is increased by 50%.)

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.game_description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon cannot be Confused while having this ability. Blocks Intimidate
abilities.full_description: This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused. (Effect: The Pokémon cannot be Confused while having this ability. Blocks Intimidate)

blocks: The Pokémon cannot be Confused while having this ability. Blocks Intimidate

abilities.name: Parental Bond
abilities.game_description: Parent and child each attacks.
abilities.technical_effect: Every move used by the Pokémon will hit twice. The damage inflicted by the second hit is reduced to 25%. If the move used is a damaging move, each hit is capable of afflicting Secondary Effects and Critical Hits
abilities.full_description: Parent and child each attacks. (Effect: Every move used by the Pokémon will hit twice. The damage inflicted by the second hit is reduced to 25%. If the move used is a damaging move, each hit is capable of afflicting Secondary Effects and Critical Hits)

abilities.full_description: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

abilities.name: Perish Body
abilities.game_description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
abilities.full_description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.game_description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact.

abilities.full_description: Steals an item from an attacker that made direct contact. (Effect: When a Pokémon makes physical contact with the Pokémon, the item of the opponent is stolen.)

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
abilities.technical_effect: Has a 10% chance of finding and holding an item after battle. Will not work if this Pokémon is already holding an item. From Black & White, it allows for the user to pick up the item of its opponent or ally if they used up the item in battle.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too. (Effect: Has a 10% chance of finding and holding an item after battle. Will not work if this Pokémon is already holding an item. From Black & White, it allows for the user to pick up the item of its opponent or ally if they used up the item in battle.)

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
abilities.technical_effect: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with PARALYZE when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokémon.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis. (Effect: The opponent has a 30% chance of being induced with PARALYZE when using an attack, that requires physical contact, against this Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
abilities.technical_effect: Speed raises by one level every time the Pokémon flinches.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon's determination boosts the Speed stat each time the Pokémon flinches. (Effect: Speed raises by one level every time the Pokémon flinches.)

abilities.name: Steam Engine
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
abilities.technical_effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type or Water-type move, its Speed is increased by 6 stages
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move. (Effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type or Water-type move, its Speed is increased by 6 stages)

abilities.name: Steelworker
abilities.game_description: Powers up Steel-type moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%
abilities.full_description: Powers up Steel-type moves. (Effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%)

abilities.name: Steely Spirit
abilities.game_description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by the user or any Ally Pokémon by 50%
abilities.full_description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves. (Effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by the user or any Ally Pokémon by 50%)

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.game_description: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
abilities.technical_effect: If the Pokémon uses a move that deals damage on the opponent, there is a chance the opponent flinches
abilities.full_description: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch. (Effect: If the Pokémon uses a move that deals damage on the opponent, there is a chance the opponent flinches)

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.game_description: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
abilities.technical_effect: This Pokémon’s item cannot be taken.
abilities.full_description: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon. (Effect: This Pokémon’s item cannot be taken.)

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.game_description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit  by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
abilities.technical_effect: Water-type moves are drawn to this Pokémon. Water-type moves will do no damage and the Pokémon's SP ATK is raised one stage
abilities.full_description: Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit  by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk. (Effect: Water-type moves are drawn to this Pokémon. Water-type moves will do no damage and the Pokémon's SP ATK is raised one stage)

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases the power of biting moves by 50%
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves. (Effect: Increases the power of biting moves by 50%)

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.game_description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon will remain with 1 HP if it was going to be knocked out by a move when at full Hit Points, and it is immune to One Hit KO moves.
abilities.full_description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either. (Effect: The Pokémon will remain with 1 HP if it was going to be knocked out by a move when at full Hit Points, and it is immune to One Hit KO moves.)

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.game_description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
abilities.technical_effect: Negates moves that force switching out.
abilities.full_description: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out. (Effect: Negates moves that force switching out.)

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
abilities.technical_effect: Raises the critical-hit ratio of moves by one level.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted. (Effect: Raises the critical-hit ratio of moves by one level.)

abilities.name: Supersweet Syrup
abilities.game_description: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.
abilities.technical_effect: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle
abilities.full_description: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon. (Effect: Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle)

abilities.name: Supreme Overlord
abilities.game_description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted by 10% for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
abilities.full_description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted by 10% for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

abilities.name: Surge Surfer
abilities.game_description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
abilities.full_description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.game_description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
abilities.technical_effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Bug-type moves is increased by 50%.
abilities.full_description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low. (Effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Bug-type moves is increased by 50%.)

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.game_description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.
abilities.full_description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.
abilities.technical_effect: When rainy, The Pokémon’s Speed doubles.
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain. (Effect: When rainy, The Pokémon’s Speed doubles.)

abilities.name: Sword of Ruin
abilities.game_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Sword of Ruin abilities.
abilities.full_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Sword of Ruin abilities.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
abilities.technical_effect: Passes the Pokémon's hold item to its adjacent ally when that ally consumes its hold item
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item. (Effect: Passes the Pokémon's hold item to its adjacent ally when that ally consumes its hold item)

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.game_description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.
abilities.technical_effect: When this Pokémon becomes Poisoned, Paralyzed, or Burned, so does the opponent. However, Fire-type and Water Veil ability Pokémon cannot be Burned, Poison-type and Steel-type and Immunity ability Pokémon cannot be Poisoned, and Limber ability Pokémon cannot be Paralyzed.
abilities.full_description: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon. (Effect: When this Pokémon becomes Poisoned, Paralyzed, or Burned, so does the opponent. However, Fire-type and Water Veil ability Pokémon cannot be Burned, Poison-type and Steel-type and Immunity ability Pokémon cannot be Poisoned, and Limber ability Pokémon cannot be Paralyzed.)

abilities.name: Tablets of Ruin
abilities.game_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Tablets of Ruin abilities.
abilities.full_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Tablets of Ruin abilities.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.game_description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
abilities.technical_effect: Pokémon’s evasion raises one level when Confused.
abilities.full_description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused. (Effect: Pokémon’s evasion raises one level when Confused.)

abilities.name: Tangling Hair
abilities.game_description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
abilities.technical_effect: Lowers opponent's Speed by 1 stage when the opponent makes physical contact with the Pokémon
abilities.full_description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat. (Effect: Lowers opponent's Speed by 1 stage when the opponent makes physical contact with the Pokémon)

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.game_description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Moves with a base power of 60 or less are boosted in power by 50%
abilities.full_description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves. (Effect: Moves with a base power of 60 or less are boosted in power by 50%)

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.game_description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
abilities.technical_effect: Prevents damage from team-mates during Double battles
abilities.full_description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it. (Effect: Prevents damage from team-mates during Double battles)

abilities.name: Tera Shell
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

abilities.name: Tera Shift
abilities.game_description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.
abilities.full_description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

abilities.name: Teraform Zero
abilities.game_description: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.
abilities.full_description: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

abilities.name: Teravolt
abilities.game_description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
abilities.full_description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: Thermal Exchange
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Fire and Ice-type moves deal 50% damage.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves. (Effect: Fire and Ice-type moves deal 50% damage.)

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
abilities.technical_effect: The power of “not very effective” moves is doubled.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage. (Effect: The power of “not very effective” moves is doubled.)

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.game_description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
abilities.technical_effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Water-type moves is increased by 50%.
abilities.full_description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low. (Effect: When HP is below 1/3rd its maximum, power of Water-type moves is increased by 50%.)

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.game_description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases the power of moves that make physical contact by 30%
abilities.full_description: Powers up moves that make direct contact. (Effect: Increases the power of moves that make physical contact by 30%)

abilities.name: Toxic Boost
abilities.game_description: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
abilities.technical_effect: Attack stat increased by 50% when Poisoned
abilities.full_description: Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned. (Effect: Attack stat increased by 50% when Poisoned)

abilities.name: Toxic Chain
abilities.game_description: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.
abilities.full_description: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.

abilities.name: Toxic Debris
abilities.game_description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
abilities.full_description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.game_description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.
abilities.technical_effect: Ability becomes the same as that of the opponent. Switching this Pokémon out of battle restores its original ability. In a Double Battle, a random opponent’s ability will be copied.
abilities.full_description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability. (Effect: Ability becomes the same as that of the opponent. Switching this Pokémon out of battle restores its original ability. In a Double Battle, a random opponent’s ability will be copied.)

abilities.name: Transistor
abilities.game_description: Powers up Electric-type moves.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases the damage inflicted by Electric-type moves by 30%
abilities.full_description: Powers up Electric-type moves. (Effect: Increases the damage inflicted by Electric-type moves by 30%)

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.game_description: Gives priority to a healing move.
abilities.technical_effect: Healing moves have +3 Priority when used by this Pokémon.
abilities.full_description: Gives priority to a healing move. (Effect: Healing moves have +3 Priority when used by this Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon can't use a move the following turn if it uses one.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon cannot use a move in the turn following one where it used a move, even if that move failed.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon can't use a move the following turn if it uses one. (Effect: The Pokémon cannot use a move in the turn following one where it used a move, even if that move failed.)

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.game_description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
abilities.full_description: Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.game_description: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes.
abilities.technical_effect: Foe’s stat modifications are ignored.
abilities.full_description: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target Pokémon's stat changes. (Effect: Foe’s stat modifications are ignored.)

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is  used or lost.
abilities.technical_effect: Speed is doubled once the held item is consumed.
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is  used or lost. (Effect: Speed is doubled once the held item is consumed.)

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.game_description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
abilities.technical_effect: The opponent Pokémon will never use their held Berry while the Pokémon is in battle.
abilities.full_description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries. (Effect: The opponent Pokémon will never use their held Berry while the Pokémon is in battle.)

abilities.name: Unseen Fist
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon can deal damage with moves that make physical contact, even if the target is protected.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon can deal damage with moves that make physical contact, even if the target is protected.

abilities.name: Vessel of Ruin
abilities.game_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Vessel of Ruin abilities.
abilities.full_description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%. It is also not affected by other Vessel of Ruin abilities.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.game_description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
abilities.technical_effect: Accuracy for the Pokémon and Allys is raised by 10%
abilities.full_description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself. (Effect: Accuracy for the Pokémon and Allys is raised by 10%)

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon cannot be Asleep while having this ability.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep. (Effect: The Pokémon cannot be Asleep while having this ability.)

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.game_description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Electric-type moves.
abilities.full_description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage. (Effect: The Pokémon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Electric-type moves.)

abilities.name: Wandering Spirit
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.game_description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Water-type moves.
abilities.full_description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of taking damage. (Effect: The Pokémon heals up to 1/4 of its maximum Hit Points when hit with Water-type moves.)

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.game_description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
abilities.technical_effect: Decreases Fire-type move power on the Pokémon by 50%. Increases power of Water-type moves used by the Pokémon by 100% before adding STAB. Prevents Burn
abilities.full_description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn. (Effect: Decreases Fire-type move power on the Pokémon by 50%. Increases power of Water-type moves used by the Pokémon by 100% before adding STAB. Prevents Burn)

abilities.name: Water Compaction
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.
abilities.technical_effect: Increases Defense by 2 stages every time it is hit by a Water-type move
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move. (Effect: Increases Defense by 2 stages every time it is hit by a Water-type move)

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
abilities.technical_effect: This Pokémon cannot be Burned while having this ability.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn. (Effect: This Pokémon cannot be Burned while having this ability.)

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.game_description: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
abilities.technical_effect: When hit by an attack, the Pokémon's Defense is lowered by one stage but Speed is increased by two stages.
abilities.full_description: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat. (Effect: When hit by an attack, the Pokémon's Defense is lowered by one stage but Speed is increased by two stages.)

abilities.name: Well-Baked Body
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.
abilities.technical_effect: This Pokémon receives no damage when hit by Fire-type moves and boosts its Defense stat by 2 stages
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted. (Effect: This Pokémon receives no damage when hit by Fire-type moves and boosts its Defense stat by 2 stages)

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
abilities.technical_effect: Opponents’ moves which lower this Pokémon’s stats have no effect. However this Pokémon may lower its own stats with its own moves.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats. (Effect: Opponents’ moves which lower this Pokémon’s stats have no effect. However this Pokémon may lower its own stats with its own moves.)

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
abilities.technical_effect: When the Pokémon's Hit Points hit 50% or less, the Pokémon will switch out. Works once per battle. The Pokémon will not switch out if it drops below 50% due to Confusion, Weather, use of Substitute or when the damage inflicted is by a Pokémon with the Sheer Force ability. It will not activate if health is brought back up above 50% due to a hold item
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less. (Effect: When the Pokémon's Hit Points hit 50% or less, the Pokémon will switch out. Works once per battle. The Pokémon will not switch out if it drops below 50% due to Confusion, Weather, use of Substitute or when the damage inflicted is by a Pokémon with the Sheer Force ability. It will not activate if health is brought back up above 50% due to a hold item)

abilities.name: Wind Power
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

abilities.name: Wind Rider
abilities.game_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
abilities.full_description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.game_description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.
abilities.technical_effect: The Pokémon is only harmed by Super Effective damage, weather effects and condition effects.
abilities.full_description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon. (Effect: The Pokémon is only harmed by Super Effective damage, weather effects and condition effects.)

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.game_description: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
abilities.technical_effect: Makes non-damaging moves that are targeted at this Pokémon have the accuracy of 50%.
abilities.full_description: Makes status moves more likely to miss. (Effect: Makes non-damaging moves that are targeted at this Pokémon have the accuracy of 50%.)

abilities.name: Zen Mode
abilities.game_description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less.
abilities.technical_effect: When Hit Points get to 50% of maximum, the Pokémon changes form. The Pokémon reverts back to its standard form if it loses this ability or returns to over 50% of its Hit Points
abilities.full_description: Changes the Pokémon's shape when HP is half or less. (Effect: When Hit Points get to 50% of maximum, the Pokémon changes form. The Pokémon reverts back to its standard form if it loses this ability or returns to over 50% of its Hit Points)

abilities.name: Zero to Hero
abilities.game_description: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
abilities.full_description: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
